thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 6 of 1735
thread.title: Holly

author: Holly
title: Holly
text: Flighthub had the best prices available and a very user friendly interface for planning my trip. The only thing I didn't see coming was the Manulife insurance somehow got tacked on - not by me purposefully. But I immediately contacted Flight Hub and the lady there helped me successfully refund the accidental insurance purchase in 5-10 minutes. So overall a good experience and I will use the service again in future.
